gml:Dictionary.gml:description: Building types commonly used in agricultural contexts. (Lista de Códigos para tipos de construção do FarmGML)
gml:Dictionary.gml:name: BuildingType

gml:Definition.gml:name: Silo
gml:Definition.gml:description: Structure used for bulk storage of grain or silage.

gml:Definition.gml:name: Barn
gml:Definition.gml:description: Building used for housing livestock and storing fodder.

gml:Definition.gml:name: Stable
gml:Definition.gml:description: Building used to house horses or other work animals.
